block.p: LEAD: Texaco Inc., one of the nation's oil giants, announced a $1 million program to plant trees this spring to start private-sector involvement in President Bush's ''America the Beautiful'' program. James W. Kinnear, Texaco's president, said the money would be shared by Denver, Houston and New Orleans, where the company has extensive operations.
